Now here you castled, but as you learn later, an advanced pawn is a dangerous thing. So while I support castling early, I support capturing an advanced, wayward unprotected pawn more.

In my mind the preferred trade from your point of view is knight takes knight. The reason I say that is that bishops are easier to manage late in the game.
